body: Watchers of the Ethereal Plane and the Elemental Planes, monadic devas usually serve those who summon them only in purposes that deal with their duties on those planes. Stubborn in their causes, they demand outrageous gifts of servitude toward their own lofty goals.
name: Monadic Deva
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Binding Outsiders/Outsider Categories/Angels/Monadic Deva
